name: くすり指の教科書２
summary: It's a new school year for our guy. He is feeling a bit down since he doesn't have a girlfriend. He met a guy(main guy from #1?) who soon became his friend. He has to invite a girl to their new lunch club. Which of 5 girls will he pick? After that, there is summer and winter loving to enjoy.
info:
• 中文名: 无名指的教科书2
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1997/07/31
  • 售价: ￥ 1,980（中古）
  • 官方网站: http://web.archive.org/web/20031211093616/http://www.active-soft.jp/catalog/kusuri2.html
